fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Target a player. If they are capable of converting players, you will kill them with an Overkill Attack.
-Spray Pesticide across the entire town, dealing an Overkill Attack to anyone who has a role with conversion capabilities. This ability cannot be used until Night 4.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You cannot be converted to another role or faction in any way, shape or form. This attribute cannot be bypassed or otherwise removed.
-If you are visited by a role that can convert, you will deal an Overkill Attack to them.
-This role can only spawn if there is at least one role that it can kill.
-This role cannot have its text modified by any sources. This includes transferring, changing, or otherwise altering abilities and attributes.
